Name: Conservation Event - Type
Description: This field is used to record the type of conservation event performed on the documented archival unit.

Name: Conservation Event - Earliest
Description: This field is used to record the earliest date for a conservation event performed on the documented archival unit.

Name: Conservation Event - Latest
Description: This field is used to record the latest date for a conservation event performed on the documented archival unit.

Name: Conservator
Description: This field is used to record the actor that  carried out the conservation event performed on the documented archival unit.

Name: Conservation Event Description
Description: This field used to record a description in free text format related to the conservation event performed on the documented artwork.

Name: Past Ownership Period Statement - Earliest date of taking of Possession
Description: This field is used to record the earliest possible date for taking possession of the documented archival unit by some actor.

Name: Past Ownership Period Statement - Latest Date of taking of Possession
Description: This field is used to record the latest possible date for taking possession of the documented archival unit by some actor.

Name: Past Ownership Period Statement - Actor Obtaining Ownership
Description: This field is used to record the actor taking possession of the documented archival unit.

Name: Past Ownership Period Statement - Earliest Ceding of Possession
Description: This field is used to record the earliest possible date for ceding of possession of the documented archival unit by some actor.

Name: Past Ownership Period Statement - Latest Ceding of Possession
Description: This field is used to record the latest possible date for ceding of possession of the documented archival unit by some actor.

Name: Past Ownership Period Statement - Actor Ceding Ownership
Description: This field is used to record the actor who has ceded possession of the documented archival unit.

Name: Past Ownership Description
Description: This field used is used to record a description in free text related to an ownership period for the documented archival unit.

Name: Condition State Type
Description: This field is used to indicate a condition state type that has been attributed to the documented archival unit.

Name: Condition Assessment Assigned By
Description: This field is used to indicate the actor who attributed the condition state type to the documented archival unit.

Name: Condition Assessment Description
Description: This field is used to describe the attributed condition of the physical object

Name: Condition Assessment Date Earliest
Description: This field is used to record the earliest possible date for the condition assessment of the documented archival unit.

Name: Condition Assessment Date Latest
Description: This field is used to record the latest possible date for the condition assessment of the documented archival unit.

Name: Appraised Amount/Value
Description: This field is used to indicate a monetary amount or value which the documented archival unit is appraised to be worth.

Name: Appraised Amount Currency
Description: This field is used to indicate the currency of the monetary amount or value which the documented archival unit is appraised to be worth.

Name: Appraisal Event Type
Description: This field is used to indicate the type of appraisal carried out on the documented archival unit.

Name: Appraisal Description
Description: This field is used to allow a free text description of the appraisal event of the documented archival unit.

Name: Appraiser
Description: This field is used to describe the appraiser of the documented archival unit.

Name: Appraisal Date Earliest
Description: This field is used to record the earliest possible date for the appraisal of the documented archival unit.

Name: Appraisal Date Latest
Description: This field is used to record the latest possible date for the appraisal of the documented archival unit.
